text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
……Okay! Trainer, is it okay over there? 
It's not wobbly?

Yeah, looks like there's no issue. Looks like the tent is set up…… 
So all the preparations for our 『Special Training Camp』 are done.

Yeah, looks like there's no issue. Looks like the tent is set up…… 
So all the preparations for our 『Special Training Camp』 are done.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Right! Well, rather than Training Camp, it's more like a mountain 
retreat? That's how it feels. But that's fine, bring it on!

……That's the spirit, Pandora. 
Oh, it's already this late……I have to go pick them up now.

……That's the spirit, Pandora. 
Oh, it's already this late……I have to go pick them up now.

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
——Wow, cool!! Looks like the Leading Role is here. 
Fufu, the carefree smile I see in the dorms seems to be gone.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Sorry for making you wait. 
Preparations on our end are all complete.

Thanks for coming here. 
Thanks for helping from today on.

Thanks for coming here. 
Thanks for helping from today on.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Osu, please!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: ……that said, there's one more thing I want to say.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Heart-chan and everyone. 
You don't have to teach me anything.

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text: Huh? ……Do you mind if I ask what you mean by that?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
My senpai is Ku-chan-senpai. 
……She's taught me everything I need to know.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
That's why I want all of you, to compete against me. 
As if I were a rival.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
……Please. Compete against me seriously! 
Just like you always did with senpai!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: I see. ……So you don't need guidance.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
——Then, we won't hold back. 
As many times as it takes, we'll continue to crush you!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Come at us, Fusaichi Pandora.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Aha! ——'Course, I'll do it!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Really……she just keeps changing. That Pandora-san would 
be the one to propose a training camp like this.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
At the 『Shuka Sho』, honestly…… 
I felt like I ran like never before.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
After all the training, and even during the race. 
I did all I could. Everything I could. It was really all I had.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: ——But even than, I still lost.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Trainer. ……I wasn't a genius after all. 
If I stay like this, then I'm sure to lose the Elizabeth Cup too.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
But……but, that's why!! 
I don't want to stay like this!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Please, Trainer. 
I want to become stronger……!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
I want to, I need to, from now on!! 
Because……because I——!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Huu-…………Alright. 
——Please, Trainer!

And so——In an environment surrounded by her predecessors and their 
overwhelming strength, Fusaichi Pandora's 『Training Camp』 begins!

text_block_list.name: Team <Ascella>
text_block_list.text: One-two……Pandora, do your bestーーー!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Ooosu——! Huu—, Huuu—……Nnngugugugugugu……!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Yes, remember to step firmly. One more set, Pandora-san!

The training is going to be dull and repetitive…… 
But hang in there, Pandora! To significantly improve 
your level, a solid foundation is necessary!

The training is going to be dull and repetitive…… 
But hang in there, Pandora! To significantly improve 
your level, a solid foundation is necessary!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: I get it……already! Not yet, not yet～～～!!

(With the help of her teammates, the entire morning was 
spent on fundamentals……! And then, in the afternoon——)

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text: ——Okay, time to speed up… NOW!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Ugh……! Haa, haa, haa……!!

Focus on your own pace! It's important to be aware of your 
immediate surroundings, but it's equally important keep a 
broad perspective! Be cognizant of the entire race picture.

Focus on your own pace! It's important to be aware of your 
immediate surroundings, but it's equally important keep a 
broad perspective! Be cognizant of the entire race picture.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Under-……stood……cognizant, cognizant～……!!

Right, that's it! Now, it's just the last leg…… 
They're coming up behind you, just hold out, Pandora!!

Right, that's it! Now, it's just the last leg…… 
They're coming up behind you, just hold out, Pandora!!

text_block_list.name: Messiah & Cesario
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaaaaaaaー!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Hold out, hold out! Hold hold hold hold…… 
Uuuwaaaaahhーーーーー!!

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
It might be in a slightly different way than you, but I also 
admire Kraft. No, in that regard, maybe I'd be your senpai?

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
So I carry her light with me——with the will of a "Queen", 
to become that link, my feet won't stop just yet.

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
Even now, I am still on the front lines of that battle! I will still 
continue! I have no intentions of giving up on the Queen's throne!

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Carrying those emotions in our hearts……and inheriting them as our 
own. Turning that in to the strength to press on in to the future.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
For that undertaking. For that prestige. 
Do you fully and completely grasp its significance?

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Let's find out. Or rather, let's ensure that you do. Until it's 
burned in to your body and soul——we'll engrave it directly in to you.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
The 『Queen Elizabeth Cup』 itself is where countless 
Tiara Uma Musume gather to compete, regardless of 
class. A race to decide who stands at the peak.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
And that is precisely why I will become a part of that history. 
……With the presence of a 『Queen』, I will stand in your path.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Come, Fusaichi Pandora. 
The "Queen of Two Countries" Cesario, will be your opponent!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Not yet……Not yet! 
Just one more……!!

(In the afternoon, we'd continue to challenge 
Kraft's rivals! She would gain experience, hone 
her race instincts……and 『Become』 a contender!)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: ……Uwaaaaaaaaaaaaahーーーーー!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa, haa……cough…… 
Haha, this is so tough……

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: But……I won't give up, ever……!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(I'm not a genius. I wasn't anywhere close to that! 
I even lost all of the Triple Tiara races!)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(I was weak! I was lacking so much! 
But……even then……!!)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(Even then, senpai, always——!! 
She was always thinking about me——!!)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『It's fine, you'll be fine for sure! 
Because Pandora-san's future will surely be——』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『Something nobody has ever seen before, it'll shine bright 
and be wonderful. If it's Pandora-san, then you can do it!』

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(Ku-chan-senpai, always, always. 
She believed in me!)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (That's why……I will——!!)

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
……It's time. Let's begin. Tomorrow we'll be returning to campus, 
so today is probably the end of our parallel running.

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
Now then. So far, you haven't once taken the lead from us 
——Obviously, you don't plan on letting it end like this, do you?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Heh. That's something to look forward to for after our run!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Very well. 
Today is the day to show your progress!

……Alright, everyone's in position. 
Then, ready——

……Alright, everyone's in position. 
Then, ready——

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa——!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『You're so brilliant. 
An Uma Musume that's a collection of hopes——』

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(She was thinking about me, and believed in me! 
Senpai gave me everything!!)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (That's why, I will——! I will do it!)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (I will——continue that link!!)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: ——Aaaaaaaaaah!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(I will do it! I will be that link! 
I will be Ku-chan-senpai's legacy!!)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(Because senpai gave everything to me! 
Senpai is with me. She'll be here with me!)

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: Not yet! We're just getting started……!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Let's go, Fusaichi Pandora! Haaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (I won't let them! I will be that link, I will win!!)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (I will become it! Senpai's——Hope!!)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: I will be the one!! ——To do iiiiiiitt!!

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
Haa……! Haa, haa, haa……—— 
……Congrats.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Looks like you were finally able to hold on to the end. 
This run, was just like——

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
……No, perhaps saying that would be too presumptuous. 
However, that was splendid Pandora-san.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Yeah. ……all of this is the results of your efforts.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Pandora-san. 
We're……leaving it to you.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: ……——Mmhmm!
